A frontend application that fetches all data from backend APIs
A backend application that connects to a PostgreSQL database using environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp
Real-time display of restaurant and recipe information
Search functionality for finding specific recipes
Ability to view user reviews and ratings for restaurants and recipes
Ability for users to add their own reviews and ratings
UI styled with lemon chiffon background and chocolate-colored components
Package.json configured with `npm run install:all` to install both frontend and backend dependencies
Package.json configured with `npm run dev` to start both frontend and backend concurrently
API endpoints for retrieving restaurant data
API endpoints for retrieving recipe data
API endpoints for retrieving user reviews and ratings
API endpoints for submitting new user reviews and ratings
Responsive design compatible with modern browsers
